snippet.title: Visual Out Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Out now! Get Visual Out here:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/675910/Visual_Out/
https://madameberry.itch.io/visual-out

As a program defying your operating system's wishes, plunge into the depths of a dying computer, and augment yourself with data-scrambling abilities like the Jammer, Current, Turret, and more.  Uncover the secrets behind the computer's - and its creator's - demise in Visual Out, an upcoming game for Steam and itch.io.

---

MadameBerry Games
patreon.com/madameberry
madameberry.com

Music:  Abstraction Music - http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

Visual Out is made in Construct 2.  https://www.scirra.com

Glitch Effects: Rampant Design - http://rampantdesigntools.com/

©2017 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
